Kako ćemo sad: Drakonske kazne za nameštanje u Srbiji
05 Nov 2019, 11:29 by Nemanja
Izvršni odbor Fudbalskog saveza Srbije juče je na sednici u Staroj Pazovi pooštrio kazne klubovima za nameštanje utakmica, preneo je ,,Sportski žurnal“.
Nije srpski fudbal prelepa bajka u kojoj je nameštanje misaona imenica. Tako je nedavno i dokazano da je meč Druge lige Srbije između Smedereva i Kabela iz Novog Sada namešten, a inicijativa Unije evropskih fudbalskih asocijacija (UEFA) urodila je plodom. te se ovaj meč prethodno istražio.
Tako, nečasne radnje u domaćem fudbalu biće drastično kažnjene u budućnosti, a najgore će proći ponavljači. Naime, ukoliko se desi da neki klub ponovo namesti utakmicu, preti mu oduzimanje i do 30 bodova, a za treći put sledi mu izbacivanje iz lige.
Odluka koja je bila na snazi od ranije – oduzimanje od tri do deset bodova i dalje je prisutna.
Ovaj nacrt Disciplinskog pravilnika usvojen je juče i on će već ove nedelje stupiti na snagu.

How we do it now: Draconian penalties for setting up in Serbia
05 Nov 2019, 11:29 by Nemanja
The Executive Board of the Serbian Football Federation yesterday tightened penalties for match-fixing clubs in Stara Pazova, the Sports Journal reported.
Not Serbian football is a beautiful fairy tale in which the noun is a noun. Thus, it has recently been proven that the match of the Second League of Serbia between Smederevo and Kabel from Novi Sad is rigged, and the initiative of the Union of European Football Associations (UEFA) has come to fruition. and this match was previously explored.
Thus, dishonest actions in domestic football will be punished drastically in the future, and the worst will be repeated. Namely, if a club resets the game, it threatens to forfeit up to 30 points, followed by its expulsion from the league for the third time.
The decision that was in place from earlier - subtracting three to ten points is still there.
This draft Disciplinary Code was adopted yesterday and will enter into force this week.
